titocc.compiler.elements

Class IfStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • titocc.compiler.elements.CodeElement
      • titocc.compiler.elements.Statement
        • titocc.compiler.elements.IfStatement

  • public class IfStatement
extends Statement
    If statement. Consists of test expression, a "true statement" and optional "else statement".

    EBNF definition:
    IF_STATEMENT = "if" "(" EXPRESSION ")" STATEMENT ["else" STATEMENT]

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IfStatement(Expression test, Statement trueStatement, Statement elseStatement, int line, int column)
      Constructs an IfStatement.

      Generates assembly code for the statement.

      Returns the else/second statement.

      Returns the test expression.
      Statement getTrueStatement()
      Returns the true/first statement.

      Attempts to parse an if statement from token stream.

      Returns a string representation of the code element for testing and debugging purposes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IfStatement

        public IfStatement(Expression test,
           Statement trueStatement,
           Statement elseStatement,
           int line,
           int column)
        Constructs an IfStatement.
        Parameters:
        test - expression used as the test
        trueStatement - statement evaluated when test is not 0
        elseStatement - statement evaluated when test is 0; this parameter can be null if there is no else statement
        line - starting line number of the if statement
        column - starting column/character of the if statement

    • Method Detail

        Returns the test expression.

        the test expression

      • getTrueStatement

        public Statement getTrueStatement()
        Returns the true/first statement.
        Returns:
        the true statement

      • getElseStatement

        public Statement getElseStatement()
        Returns the else/second statement.
        Returns:
        the else statement, or null if there isn't one

      • compile

        public void compile(Assembler asm,
           Scope scope,
           Registers regs)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    SyntaxException
        Description copied from class: Statement
        Generates assembly code for the statement.
        Specified by:
        compile in class Statement
        Parameters:
        asm - assembler used for code generation
        scope - scope in which the statement is evaluated
        regs - available registers; must have at least one active register
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if assembler throws
        SyntaxException - if statement contains an error

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description copied from class: CodeElement
        Returns a string representation of the code element for testing and debugging purposes.
        Overrides:
        toString in class CodeElement
        Returns:
        the string representation

      • parse

        public static IfStatement parse(TokenStream tokens)
        Attempts to parse an if statement from token stream. If parsing fails the stream is reset to its initial position.
        Parameters:
        tokens - source token stream
        Returns:
        IfStatement object or null if tokens don't form a valid if statement
